column5: Life insurance is a concept that aims to provide financial protection to the family members of the insured individual in case of an unfortunate eventuality such as the demise of the insured individual.

column2: Can a minor be the nominee of an insurance policy
column5: Yes #comma a minor can be the nominee of a policy. However #comma he or she must have a legal guardian in the form of an appointee.
